titles.title: MP1118 There must be more than this

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There must be more than this:
O Breath of God, come breathe within.
There must be more than this:
Spirit of God, we wait for You.
Fill us anew, we pray;
Fill us anew, we pray.

verse.name: v2
c1
verse.lines:
Consuming fire,
Fan into flame
A passion for Your name.
Spirit of God,
Fall in this place.
Lord, have Your way,
Lord, have Your way with us.
